game.name: Welcome Back To 2007 Part II
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Would you say that 2007 cannot be returned? After 11 long years, 2007 are coming back to us in 2018! AGAIN! Be ready for Cool Story! Old-school platformer game.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Would you say that 2007 cannot be returned? After 11 long years, 2007 are coming back to us in 2018! AGAIN! Be ready for Cool Story! Old-school platformer game.

reviewHighlights.text: One of the better indie platformers...if you manage to get through the first level
Welcome Back to 2007 Part II is a strange, scrappy little platformer that fully embraces its own absurdity. Developed and published by Siberian Mouse,...
